A70B102C688F487592EFAF0192308A67.description: Uses data from the leadership effort to describe, analyze, and evaluate the impact on student learning. (Advanced-Level Performance)

1CDB295B3F2242C0B17C00C45F60115C.description: Analyzes student learning and/or other data appropriately to evaluate the results of planned and executed leadership efforts. (Initial-Level Performance)

7B2B929B49A5443CAA8C74EE153278F6.description: Analyzes data to evaluate the results of planned and executed leadership efforts.

DCDE8A3ABC0F42B587F6B61B0B88D6DF.description: Effectively implements the leadership work plan. (Advanced-Level Performance)

D1C3457FDB0E427092DCBA25AA44A161.description: Implements the approved leadership work plan that has a clear timeline of events/actions and a clear description of how impact will be assessed. (Initial-Level Performance)

5EFE44E92EC646909712339799737F14.description: Implements a plan for engaging in leadership activities.

F5DDE3959890468EB599841D8C3725C2.description: Develops a leadership work plan that clearly describes the purpose, scope, participants involved, timeline of events/actions, and plan for assessing progress and impact. (Advanced-Level Performance)

3C316CD40EEB4DC78328D367DA2DA18F.description: Develops a leadership work plan that describes the purpose, scope, and participants involved and how the impact on student learning and/or the professional environment will be assessed. (Initial-Level Performance)

B74DCE03F6E44AFEBDFD25C7102835A1.description: Develops a plan for engaging in leadership activities.

C0CE6E0318BC4B36BE6A2FF1805A2993.description: Identifies leadership opportunities within the school, community, or professional organizations to advance learning, improve instructional practice, facilitate professional development of colleagues, or advocate positive policy change; and selects an opportunity to demonstrate initiative, planning, organization, and professional judgment. 9EF3AD1E4E1E4A089CDBC2D63EDF8F48.description: Identifies leadership opportunities in the school, community, or professional organizations and selects one with the potential for positive impact on learning or the professional environment and is realistic in terms of knowledge, skill, and time required. (Initial-Level Performance)

7D06E6C068284CCA82DB3036D59B1B73.description: Identifies leadership opportunities that enhance student learning and/or professional environment of the school.

comments: The teacher provides professional leadership within the school, community, and education profession to improve student learning and well-being.

6778DD9CB73C457C9E0ACF0D41C19ED5.description: Shows clear evidence of the impact of professional growth activities on instructional effectiveness and student learning. (Advanced-Level Performance)

C3C42A0A26C44F08A02B0F247F0DC651.description: Shows clear evidence of professional growth and reflection relative to the identified priority areas and impact on instructional effectiveness and student learning. (Initial-Level Performance)

390145EDFC224C309058F9F5BC10FE80.description: Designs a clear, logical professional growth plan that addresses all priority areas. (Advanced-Level Performance)

EBE2268D769A4A2C981C9E6A05A22079.description: Designs a professional growth plan that addresses identified priorities.

ED6B29C36EEB4CAB99E8020542C5570B.description: Reflects on data from multiple sources (i.e., self-assessment, student performance, feedback from colleagues, school/district initiatives) and identifies priority areas for growth. (Advanced-Level Performance)

3E622602A6AB454FB6714766E8332321.description: Identifies priorities for professional development based on data from self-assessment, student performance and feedback from colleagues. (Initial-Level Performance)

C67F56DDC5834CE194488BF88AF0E7E0.description: Evaluates Teaching and Implements Professional Development
comments: The teacher evaluates his/her overall performance with respect to modeling and teaching Kentucky's learning goals, refines the skills and processes necessary, and implements a professional development plan.

D1C0501248D24B88BD768851B1804CCB.description: Uses appropriate student performance data to describe, analyze, and evaluate the impact of the collaborative activities on student learning and to identify next steps. (Advanced-Level Performance)

764B0E8FC94C4FC3BA2BAC251ADDF1D7.description: Analyzes student learning data to evaluate the outcomes of collaboration and identify next steps. (Initial-Level Performance)

comments: The teacher uses technology to support instruction; access and manipulate data; enhance professional growth and productivity; communicate and collaborate with colleagues, parents, and the community; and conduct research.

919E580383354B2588B74D345A1AB181.description: Provides on-going opportunities for students to assess and reflect on their own performance in order to identify strengths and areas for future learning. (Advanced-Level Performance)

A4435CD0E2AB46E8986F224289399B58.description: Promotes opportunities for students to engage in accurate self-assessment of learning. (Initial-Level Performance)

0FE522C980E74EC79C2821D4E835D125.description: Clearly communicates to students and parents in a timely manner the evidence of student performance and recommends future actions. (Advanced-Level Performance)

1C647A8C5AD549FC8D2AD8389D6EBCE3.description: Communicates learning results to students and parents that provide a clear and timely understanding of learning progress relative to objectives. (Initial-Level Performance)

4A5C8182331245E5B10A002AF848FEAE.description: Communicates learning results to students and parents.

A591DE8C2F664743AED3632238861C04.description: Consistently describes, analyzes, and evaluates student performance data to determine student progress, identify differences among student groups, and inform instructional practice. (Advanced-Level Performance)

0B6E6324C6044D56969202DC58F18B5B.description: Describes, analyzes, and evaluates student performance data to determine progress of individuals and identify differences in progress among student groups. (Initial-Level Performance)

7483197AAB264382812D5CCFDB4A6E73.description: Describes, analyzes, and evaluates student performance data.

D71A15B715C1450AB2C81CBD35D6AB19.description: Consistently uses appropriate summative assessments aligned with the learning objectives to measure student achievement. (Advanced-Level Performance)

075F3CE420FE4E07A4C1CBFC4A534CBE.description: Uses a variety of summative assessments to measure student achievement. (Initial-Level Performance)

8FC7160AA36444B4B02DB08AFD78D45F.description: Consistently uses appropriate formative assessments to determine student progress, guide instruction, and provide feedback to students. (Advanced-Level Performance)

34B9E9295BF946019AC08B9FE246F2E4.description: Consistently uses student baseline data from appropriate pre-assessments to promote the learning of all students. (Advanced-Level Performance)

F3DE10F5C490480DAA6A42E426BC1BD7.description: Uses a variety of pre-assessments to establish baseline knowledge and skills for all students. (Initial-Level Performance)

8EF22450B072438A97AC234B64CACCE5.description: The Teacher Assesses and Communicates Learning Results
comments: The teacher assesses learning and communicates results to students and others with respect to student abilities to use communication skills, apply core concepts, become self-sufficient individuals, become responsible team members, think and solve problems, and integrate knowledge.

54A870EBBA0A42B1BE1428BCA889A889.description: Consistently uses a variety of appropriate strategies to facilitate higher-order thinking. (Advanced-Level Performance)

D69602CB1883472A956C4F8715729ABB.description: Instruction provides opportunity to promote higher-order thinking. (Initial-Level Performance)

C5E625570BA447C79D6D4EE92201D4CC.description: Implements and manages instruction in ways that facilitate higher order thinking.

0F1EB87AB5794D6EA5E936BE62575B4B.description: Uses classroom space and materials effectively to facilitate student learning. (Initial-Level Performance)

45E3FC3623FC46C28DAB6205D9FE2F0A.description: Makes thoughtful choices about the organization and implementation of both instructional and non-instructional tasks to maximize time for student learning. (Advanced-Level Performance)

E83DBA2F5F4C408E8C7E8530EA589BF3.description: Establishes efficient procedures for performing non-instructional tasks, handling materials and supplies, managing transitions, and organizing and monitoring group work so that there is minimal loss of instructional time. (Initial-Level Performance)

67BCE9D3E5C64FCBAEC672F0DF1E7B27.description: Implements instruction based on contextual information and assessment data, adapting instruction to unanticipated circumstances. (Advanced-Level Performance)

D65F72E8754D4FD5B6CC0AB11704B126.description: Implements instruction based on contextual information and assessment data. (Initial-Level Performance)

385B15B698F54CA684BAAB4B4173892D.description: Implements instruction based on diverse student needs and assessment data.

68800AA2EABE4D9488CC467D0C85A8C9.description: Consistently provides a well-planned sequence of appropriate instructional strategies that actively engage students in meeting learning objectives. (Advanced-Level Performance)

612DDE93D81947C6A0C2D7BB043DF761.description: Uses a variety of instructional strategies that engage students throughout the lesson on tasks aligned with learning objectives. (Initial-Level Performance)

33AC86D43F1843FAA317036DB0D18223.description: Uses a variety of instructional strategies that align with learning objectives and actively engage students.

A3F4F04ED5ED4B61A2E24DDFA621152F.description: The Teacher Implements and Manages Instruction
comments: The teacher introduces/implements/manages instruction that develops student abilities to use communication skills, apply core concepts, become self-sufficient individuals, become responsible team members, think and solve problems, and integrate knowledge.

40352C474279405194240F7C8814D9C2.description: Maintains a classroom environment that is both emotionally and physically safe for all students. (Advanced-Level Performance)

A127B10653044393AF41B019FD8B022F.description: Provides a safe environment for learning.

3D1553AC167B49E7AB0A8DC9CE18AF72.description: Consistently treats all students with respect and concern and actively encourages students to treat each other with respect and concern. (Advanced-Level Performance)

6258A579B5EA4701BEA336CDABEFF321.description: Treats all students with respect and concern and monitors student interactions to encourage students to treat each other with respect and concern. (Initial-Level Performance)

0540299545AC4673AA452CC8930F9418.description: Fosters mutual respect between teacher and students and among students.

E64986612AF7450AA8210D72451FC41C.description: Consistently uses appropriate and responsive instructional strategies that address the needs of all students. (Advanced-Level Performance)

75A2752191584AE3AA3BA28FB7902564.description: Uses a variety of strategies and methods to supports student diversity by addressing individual needs. (Initial-Level Performance)

4C03462AF6614461B98655D0C77670DC.description: Values and supports student diversity and addresses individual needs.

DFCCD8C9EB4A48B1BE22165B0B1C97FD.description: Maintains a fair, respectful, and productive classroom environment conducive to learning. (Advanced-Level Performance)

CFE9472CDB5B467C9413C63E0797668B.description: Establishes clear standards of conduct, shows awareness of student behavior, and responds in ways that are both appropriate and respectful of students. (Initial-Level Performance)

E33774D1F03E40AA83FC47E061395D8F.description: Consistently Sets significant and challenging behavioral and learning expectations for all students and communicates confidence in their ability to achieve those expectations. (Advanced-Level Performance)

A6827AC9DD98409990709D800A17256B.description: Sets significant and challenging objectives for students and verbally/nonverbally communicates confidence in students' ability to achieve these objectives. (Initial-Level Performance)

220E11115F244723BDF05924298877F6.description: The Teacher Creates and Maintains Learning Climate
comments: The teacher creates a learning climate that supports the development of student abilities to use communication skills, apply core concepts, become self-sufficient individuals, become responsible team members, think and solve problems, and integrate knowledge.

69C5695FEE06465DB5275E66D93ECC9A.description: Plans instructional strategies and activities that facilitate multiple levels of learning.

74714BB9F706449892AB64478844DB0F.description: Plans a learning sequence using instructional strategies and activities that build on students' prior knowledge and address learning objectives. (Advanced-Level Performance)

AA80FE189BBD445BBDD5A116B95219BC.description: Plans instructional strategies and activities that address learning objectives for all students.

5EFFFEE277C84312BD20C25C7C856A2B.description: Plans and designs instruction based on contextual (i.e., student, community, and/or cultural) and pre-assessment data. (Initial-Level Performance)

47E810DB113A4DE68FDECC68E114B1A3.description: Uses contextual data to design instruction relevant to students.

E8914934CEB346C0ACC44403968D8FE3.description: Connects content to life experiences of student.

DC8816BBB8A04555AF5C586ADC4051AE.description: Accurately and effectively communicates an in-depth understanding of concepts, processes, and/or knowledge in ways that contribute to the learning of all students. (Advanced-Level Performance)

0E56917F5E0B424D9044B0D14DF13608.description: Accurately and effectively communicates concepts, processes and/or knowledge and uses vocabulary that is clear, correct and appropriate for students. (Initial-Level Performance)

F0525D3DA3744304B19420E79815ACAB.description: The Teacher Demonstrates Applied Content Knowledge
comments: The teacher demonstrates a current and sufficient academic knowledge of certified content areas to develop student knowledge and performance in those areas.
